body.name: Timberland Men's 38 Mm Boot Leather Wheat Belt
features: MEN’S 100% LEATHER BELT: The Timberland Men’s Iconic Wheat Nubuck Belt is made with 100% genuine leather and has a single-loop buckle design. It’s a perfect everyday casual mens belt leather. The belt width is 1.5 inch

CASUAL OR DRESS BELT: This leather mens belt is a versatile belt, it’s the perfect mens belt for jeans but easily converts into a dress belt. The precision manufacturing ensures durability, making it a great work belt as well as a mens belt casual

THE PERFECT FIT (BIG AND TALL SIZES AVAILABLE): For a perfect fit be sure to order 1 size larger than your pant size. If your pant size is a 36 order a belt size 38. Also men’s belts big and tall sizes are available, sizes 44 to 56.

HIGH-QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Timberland products are made to last. High-quality genuine leather, tight stitching, and precision manufacturing allow this mens leather belt to hold up to extensive and frequent use.
ICONIC WHEAT NUBUCK COLOR – Our fashionable leather belt was designed to match your iconic Timberland wheat boot. Complete your outfit with a matching belt to your Timberland boots.
body.description: For those working on the job site, going to the office or simply walking around town, do so in style while you wear a Timberland belt for men. This Timberland Men’s Classic Leather Jean Belt is made from 100% genuine leather and has a single-loop buckle. This men’s leather belt can transition from a men’s jean belt but can also be converted to be worn as a mens dress belt with slacks. Manufactured with classically cut edges and a single-prong buckle, this daily men’s leather belt simply looks great, and it’s designed to last a long time. The Timberland Men’s Classic Leather Jean Belt pairs well with high-quality jeans and Timberland boots Timberland products are designed to last for extended periods of frequent use. Our mens belts are made from high-quality genuine leather and stitched with precision manufacturing standards, which helps them hold up to frequent and extensive use. The durable construction and superior materials also withstand cold and hot weather alike, making this a perfect all-season work belt or casual belt. This street-worthy mens leather belt by Timberland is made to fit to your daily schedule and lifestyle comfortably. It is smooth to the touch and has a sharp and rich color. Timberland offers this men’s belts in different sizes. Don’t sacrifice when looking for a leather belt for men. Our Timberland Mens belts for jeans are inspired by a rich and traditional New England heritage, and the quality they produce in each product is legendary. This genuine leather jean belt is offered in big and tall sizes and is designed to match your Timberland boots. For a precision fit, it’s best to order it one size larger than your pants. Don’t settle with a no name mens casual belt, get the best mens belt available from a trusted brand like Timberland. Our quality and craftsmanship makes our jean belt for men the perfect belt for all men.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete Your Look And Match Your Style With One Of Our Other Timberland Accessories Listed Below Timberland Men's Belts If you’re on the work site, in the office or just walking around the city, do it in style with one of our belts. Timberland offers a number of different styles, ranging from leather belts, reversible belts and canvas belts. Find the belt that fits your lifestyle below. Timberland Toiletry Bags Keep all your personal items organized with one of our convenient travel kits. With a variety of colors, shapes and materials you will find the perfect toiletry bag to match your needs. Take a look below at our collection of men's travel kits and stay organized in style. Timberland Men's Wallets Timberland has a number of different leather and non-leather wallets. In our collection we offer trifold, bifold and card carrier wallets. We also have RFID protected wallets to keep your information safe and secure. Take a look below at our collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this belt
reviews.reviewText: I'm a belt girl. I've always worn leather belts. This belt is classically stylish. Great quality and look. Would buy again. Great for men or women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good price, nice quality, real leather, the color mach with my booths.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good value. Runs small by one size
reviews.reviewText: Seems well made but I ordered one size larger than I needed(38 vs 36) Still tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the color and leather.
reviews.reviewText: I love the color and the quality of this belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful belt nice and wide great color for the price, and insane value. Cheap brands at the store cost double. Steal 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024

reviews.reviewerName: This is one of the best synthetic wigs I’ve ever gotten. I love it, it’s perfect and I’ll buy again. Thank you for free eyelashes also.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needs to get bigger size
reviews.reviewText: My husband is a 34 but I ordered a 38, and the 38 is perfect so make sure you get two sizes up because runs small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs small: Take a size or two larger!
reviews.reviewText: Barely used it because of unclear description of size (discovered this runs smaller). Nice appearance, but slightly thinner (by 1mm) compared to my other belts.
One piece construction with a simple solid buckle. I like the tan finish that I think goes well with blue jeans.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product, but might not be the best option
reviews.reviewText: The materials look premium, I bought 2 sizes up and I’m using it in the last (tighter) hole.Please be aware that the color doesn’t match the Boot’s color… why Timberland???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 19, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Really nice quality belt but order at least 2 sizes up. I ordered a 36 for a 34 waist and can only use the last 2 holes. Colour is great and leather is thick and soft.

Really nice leather. Very smooth. I'm a size 33/34 waist so ordered size 36. I'm using the second tightest belt hole. I'm sure it'll stretch a little and I'll be onto the tightest. I might need to add another hole. Going for a 34 size might have worked for me, or may have been just too short. Happy with the size for now regardless. The colour is cool. Different from any other belt I've had.
